channel.title: Codices on Jade's Fire
channel.description: Recent content in Codices on Jade's Fire

item.title: Seduction as Strategy — The Fire Behind the Throne
item.description: A tactical exploration of seduction, presence, and psychological leverage — where desire becomes fuel and dominance takes many forms.

item.title: The Art of Tactical Surrender
item.description: Tactical surrender isn’t weakness—it’s supremacy, disguised in silk. This Codex entry reveals the fire-forged truth of yielding with purpose.

item.title: Reason is the Flame
item.description: The foundation of all Strategivist thought — not a belief, but a force of nature.

item.title: Selfishness Is Clean Ethics
item.description: The word they corrupted. The virtue we reclaim.

item.title: You Are Not Prometheus
item.description: You are not here to be chained for your gifts. You are here to wield them.
